original_text: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.
korean_text: 조금 있으면 너희가 나를 보지 못하겠고 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: and ye shall not see me:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 나를 보지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: because I go to the Father.
